title: Spacing markers in Latin text

## Overview

Select a passage of text. Hebrew and Vulgate versions are displayed alinged and separated visually by a Latin spacing marker. Optionally, see a visual display of the given page highlighting all Latin spacing markers

## Notebook

:::{.callout-warning title="Uses local resources"}
This notebook uses data in local files, and expects to be run files from a copy of [this github repository](https://github.com/neelsmith/complutensian-texts).
:::

- [HTML version](./complutensian-spacing-markers.html) (readable in a web browser)
- [Pluto notebook](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/neelsmith/complutensian-texts/refs/heads/main/pluto/physical-artifact/latin-spacing-markers.jl) (download and open in Pluto)
